programme.title: מועדון ווינX - במעמקי הים הקסום
programme.desc: הכל רגוע ושקט בבי"ס לפיות בו עובדות הפיות של מועדון ווינX. השלווה מופרת כשחבורת טריקס המרושעת מגיעה לאוקינוס האין-סופי, במטרה לכבוש את כס המלכות. דיבוב עברית: עדי זינו, מירב דמארי. במאי: איג'יניו סטראפי. 2014. כ' עב'.

programme.title: פלואי גיבור קטן גדול (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה מקסימה. גוזל צעיר אשר חושש ללמוד לעוף נותר מאחור כאשר משפחתו החלה נודדת דרומה בעונת הסתיו. כעת, בעזרתם של חברים טובים, עליו לנסות לצלוח את החורף הקר ולהתאחד שוב עם משפחתו האהובה. איסלנד, 2018. כ' עב'.

programme.title: הדרקון הראשון שלי 3: העולם הנסתר (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה, החלק המסיים את הטרילוגיה הקסומה מבית דרימוורקס ("שרק"). החיים בעיר הסודית של הויקינגים ודרקוניהם ניצבים בפני סכנה כאשר צייד דרקונים אימתני מגלה את מיקום העיר. דיבוב עב': ניב פטל. במאי: דין דבלואה. 2019. כ' עב'.\r\n.

programme.title: פדינגטון 2 (מדובב)
programme.desc: הרפתקאות לכל המשפחה. פדינגטון הדוב האנגלי החמוד חוזר והפעם הוא מתכנן לקנות מתנה יוקרתית לדודתו האהובה שחוגגת את יום הולדתה המאה. העלילה מסתבכת כאשר המתנה שהוא רוצה לקנות, נגנבת מהחנות. במאי: פול קינג. 2017. כ' עב'.

programme.title: קרוקודיל לייל (מדובב)
programme.desc: קומדיית לייב אקשן מוזיקלית. בבית חדש בניו יורק, נער מתקשה להתאקלם, כל זה משתנה כשהוא מגלה בעליית הגג את לייל - תנין מזמר שאוהב אמבטיות ומוזיקה טובה. דיבוב: לירון לב, אריאל לינזדן. במאים: ג'וש גורדון, וויל ספק. 2022. כ' עב'.

programme.title: הנסיך וסינדרלה (מדובב)
programme.desc: פנטזיית הרפתקאות לכל המשפחה בדיבוב של אליאנה תדהר. סיפורה של סינדרלה, נערה יפת תואר וטובת לב, שאמה ואחותה החורגות מתייחסות אליה כמו למשרתת. חייה משתנים כשבאחד הטיולים שלה ביער היא פוגשת בנסיך הממלכה. עם: אסטריד אס. 2021.

programme.title: אמילי והיגואר האחרון
programme.desc: הרפתקאות לכל המשפחה, מאת היוצרים של הלהיט 'מיה והאריה הלבן'. נערה צעירה, אשר גדלה בכפר קטן למרגלות נהר האמזונס, חוזרת אליו לאחר שנים, כדי להציל את חברה היגואר אותו נטשה, מפני סוחרי בעלי חיים. עם: אמילי בט ריצ'ארדס. 2024.

programme.title: היידי בת ההרים (מדובב)
programme.desc: הרפתקאות לכל המשפחה. הסיפור האהוב על הילדה המקסימה שחיה עם סבא שלה בהרי שוויץ הירוקים ועוברת לעיר הגדולה כדי לעזור לקלרה המרותקת לכסא גלגלים. עם: אנוק שטפן, ברונו גאנץ. דיבוב: איילה פלדמן. גרמניה, 2015. כ' עב'.

programme.title: מחכים לכם בשישי ב-yes MOVIES KIDS
programme.desc: כל סרטי הילדים והמשפחה מהערוץ זמינים עבורכם ללא תוספת תשלום עכשיו ב-yesVOD KIDS. ערוץ yes MOVIES KIDS משדר בסופי שבוע ובחגים.

programme.title: Finding You
programme.desc: Violinist Finley Sinclair travels to an Irish coastal village to begin her semester studying abroad. At the B\u0026B run by her host family, she encounters the gregarious and persistent heartthrob movie star Beckett Rush. Romantic drama, starring Rose Reid, Katherine McNamara, Vanessa Redgrave, Jedidiah Goodacre and Judith Hoag.(n)

programme.title: Frost/Nixon
programme.desc: British broadcaster and journalist David Frost comes up with the idea of setting up a series of exclusive televised interviews with the disgraced former president of the United States, Richard Nixon. Believing he could use the publicity as a chance to resurrect his political career and make some easy money, Nixon agrees but soon realises he has underestimated Frost. Fact-based drama, starring Frank Langella, Michael Sheen, Sam Rockwell and Kevin Bacon.(n)

programme.title: May December
programme.desc: Twenty years after their notorious tabloid romance gripped the nation, a married couple buckles under pressure when an actress arrives to do research for a film about their past. Director Todd Haynes' drama, starring Natalie Portman, Chris Tenzis and Julianne Moore.(n)

programme.title: Quartet
programme.desc: Three former opera singers prepare for their annual concert to mark Verdi's birthday and raise funds for their retirement home. However, this year, a famous diva has joined the group, and her history with the others threatens the performance. Comedy drama, directed by Dustin Hoffman and starring Maggie Smith, Billy Connolly, Tom Courtenay, Pauline Collins and Michael Gambon.(n)

programme.title: PS I Love You
programme.desc: Widowed Holly feels she cannot cope following the death of her husband. However, on her birthday, she receives a letter he wrote to her just before he died, encouraging her to live life to the full rather than languish in sorrow. This is just the first in a series of messages, each one sending her on wild misadventures and helping her to move on. Romantic drama based on Cecelia Ahern's novel, starring Hilary Swank, Gerard Butler and Lisa Kudrow.(n)

programme.title: Jackie
programme.desc: Following the assassination of her husband, President John F Kennedy, Jacqueline Kennedy battles with grief and trauma to regain her faith, console her children, and define JFK's legacy. Director Pablo Larrain's Bafta-winning drama, starring Natalie Portman, Peter Sarsgaard and Greta Gerwig. Mica Levi provided the Oscar-nominated score.(n)

programme.title: A Star Is Born
programme.desc: Following a gig, fading music star Jackson Maine happens upon Ally, a nightclub singer-songwriter. Their instant chemistry leads to a tempestuous romance as he helps her on the road to stardom. However, Jackson's alcoholism has explosive repercussions as her career blossoms. Oscar-winning drama, starring Lady Gaga, Bradley Cooper, who also directed, and Sam Elliott.(n)

programme.title: I Used to Be Funny
programme.desc: A stand-up comedian struggling with PTSD agonises over whether or not to join the search for a missing teenage girl she used to look after. Writer-director Ally Pankiw's comedy drama, starring Rachel Sennott and Olga Petsa.(n)

programme.title: You Can Live Forever

programme.title: The Angels' Share
programme.desc: An unemployed man with a criminal record is put on community service just as his son is born, and resolves to make a better life for his family. Befriending three fellow offenders facing an equally uncertain future, they decide to make a fresh start by stealing a cask of valuable whisky. Ken Loach's comedy drama, starring Paul Brannigan and John Henshaw.

programme.title: May December

programme.title: It Is In Us All
programme.desc: While travelling from London to Ireland to inspect a house bequeathed to him by an aunt, Hamish Considine is involved in a head-on collision. Seventeen-year-old Evan escapes from the wreckage of the other car, but a passenger is killed. A strange bond forms between the two survivors, and Hamish agrees to keep a secret for Evan about the accident. Writer/director Antonia Campbell-Hughes's drama, starring Cosmo Jarvis, Rhys Mannion and Claes Bang.

programme.title: Billionaire Boys Club
programme.desc: Led by their financial expert friend Joe Hunt, a group of young men in 1980s Los Angeles hatch a plan to get-rich-quick with a Ponzi scheme. However, the plan ends badly when Hunt and friend Jim Pittman decide to murder investor and con man Ron Levin. Co-writer/director James Cox's drama, starring Ansel Elgort, Taron Egerton and Emma Roberts.

programme.title: Life Itself
programme.desc: After falling in love at college, New Yorkers Will and Abby marry and prepare for parenthood. Meanwhile, fate links them to a group of people in Seville, Spain, including a troubled young woman. Drama, starring Oscar Isaac, Olivia Wilde and Annette Bening.

Fact-based political drama set during the 1980s, starring Tom Hanks, Julia Roberts and Philip Seymour Hoffman.

Fact-based drama, starring Leonardo DiCaprio, Tom Hanks, Christopher Walken, Martin Sheen and James Brolin.

programme.title: Drift

programme.title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
programme.desc: A shy man struggling to cope with a recent break-up is horrified to learn his impulsive former girlfriend has had all recollection of their relationship erased from her mind. He gets even by having the same treatment, but during the procedure he relives their time together and falls for her again, leaving him determined to keep his memories. Michel Gondry's surreal romantic drama, with Jim Carrey, Kate Winslet, Tom Wilkinson and Elijah Wood.

programme.title: Meet Joe Black
programme.desc: Death takes over the body of a recently deceased young man, and embarks on a mission to claim the life of a powerful media tycoon, but ends up falling in love with his daughter instead - leaving him on the horns of a dilemma. Remake of 1934 romantic fantasy Death Takes a Holiday, starring Brad Pitt, Anthony Hopkins and Claire Forlani.

programme.desc: Riley, a young woman recently released from rehab, meets Ethan and finds herself navigating the line between love and a new addiction. Director Brittany Snow's romantic comedy drama, starring Courtney Eaton, Thomas Mann and Dave Bautista.

programme.title: Miranda's Victim
programme.desc: Teenager Patricia 'Trish' Weir is committed to putting her kidnapper and rapist Ernesto Miranda in prison, while her life is wrecked by the legal system. Drama, starring Abigail Breslin, Emily VanCamp and Kyle MacLachlan.

programme.title: The Last Rifleman
programme.desc: Artie Crawford is a Second World War veteran who has just lost his wife. On the 75th anniversary of the D-Day landings in Normandy, Artie decides to secretly escape his Northern Ireland care home, and embarks on a journey to France to pay his final respects to his best friend. Drama, starring Pierce Brosnan and Jurgen Prochnow.

programme.title: The Colour Room
programme.desc: Period drama telling the story of Clarice Cliff, who broke the glass ceiling and helped revolutionise the workplace in the 20th century. Clarice is a vivacious young factory worker in the industrial British midlands of the 1920s. Bursting with ideas for colours and shapes, she takes more and more dangerous risks, but manages to stay one step ahead of the workhouse and impress eccentric factory owner Colley Shorter with her talent and innovation. Starring Phoebe Dynevor, Matthew Goode and David Morrissey.

programme.title: To Olivia
programme.desc: In 1962, writer Roald Dahl and his movie star wife Patricia Neal have retreated to the English countryside to bring up their young family. Tragically, their lives are turned upside down by the death of their daughter, Olivia. As the couple struggle through the loss, their grief becomes a source of redemption and strength which changes their destiny. Drama, starring Hugh Bonneville, Keeley Hawes and in one of his final films, Geoffrey Palmer.

programme.title: The Blind Side
programme.desc: A middle-class family take in a hulking homeless teenager, who has no education or skills to speak of. The indomitable wife encourages him to turn his life around, helping him to get the grades he needs for a college scholarship and hone his sporting skills to become an American football player. Fact-based drama, starring an Oscar-winning Sandra Bullock alongside Quinton Aaron and Tim McGraw.(n)

programme.title: Straight Outta Compton
programme.desc: Biopic of hip-hop group NWA, examining their rise to fame in the 1980s. programme.desc: The spirit of a man killed in a car crash uses his vivid imagination to create a breath-taking world - but he is unable to fully enjoy his heavenly home without his wife beside him. Fantasy, starring Robin Williams, Cuba Gooding Jr, Annabella Sciorra and Max von Sydow.(n)

programme.title: Skincare
programme.desc: Small business owner Hope Goldman performs facials to celebrity clientele and powerful businesswomen. She is poised to launch her own skincare line, but is in arrears with rent on her store at a shopping complex. Director Austin Peters' thriller, starring Elizabeth Banks and Lewis Pullman.

programme.title: Live Premier League Darts
programme.desc: Coverage of night seven of the tournament at Utilita Arena Cardiff, with a format featuring quarter-finals, semi-finals and a final all in one night. Michael van Gerwen came out on top on this night last year after he beat Luke Littler 6-3 in the final. The Dutchman had already beaten Nathan Aspinall and Michael Smith on his way to the final as he claimed his fourth overall win of the season.

programme.title: The Nun
programme.desc: A troubled priest and a novice nun discover a religious order's terrible secret and battle a malevolent force while investigating the apparent suicide of a Romanian nun. Fifth instalment in The Conjuring Universe horror saga, starring Taissa Farmiga and DemiÃ¡n Bichir.

programme.title: The Nun II
programme.desc: After her harrowing experience in 1950s Romania, Sister Irene moves to France and enjoys a quieter pace of life, guiding fresh-faced Sister Debra. Cardinal Conroy brings dire news - the ancient evil has escaped from Romania and is moving steadily eastwards across Europe, purpose unknown. He entreats Sister Irene to stop this murderous menace, and Sister Debra defies the Abbess to provide support.

programme.title: The Blackening
programme.desc: Seven friends go away for the weekend and end up trapped in a cabin with a killer who has a vendetta. He forces the group to play board game The Blackening, which punishes losing players. Director Tim Story's comedy horror, starring Grace Byers and Jermaine Fowler.

programme.title: Ride On
programme.desc: Lao Luo is a washed-up stuntman with a deformed horse called Red Hare, who he saved from euthanasia. The duo become overnight sensations when a fight with debt collectors goes viral. Writer/director Larry Yang's action drama, starring Jackie Chan, Liu Haocun and Kevin Guo. In Mandarin, with subtitles.

programme.title: Zombie Town
programme.desc: When teenagers Amy and Mike uncover an ancient curse after watching a film reel, they must track down a filmmaker and navigate a town of hungry zombies before it's too late to break the evil spell. Comedy horror based on the work of RL Stine, starring Dan Aykroyd, Chevy Chase and Madi Monroe.

programme.title: The Killer
programme.desc: An assassin tries to make amends in an attempt to restore the sight of a beautiful young singer. Director/Producer John Woo's remake of his namesake 1989 thriller, starring Nathalie Emmanuel, Omar Sy and Sam Worthington.

programme.title: Barber
programme.desc: Detective thriller starring Aidan Gillen. Shortly after the announcement of the Covid-19 pandemic, Dublin private eye Val Barber is tasked with finding a missing young woman. It isn't long before his investigation uncovers some disturbing secrets that implicate some very powerful people - and spell danger for Barber.

programme.title: Ride On
programme.desc: Lao Luo is a washed-up stuntman with a deformed horse called Red Hare, who he saved from euthanasia. The duo become overnight sensations when a fight with debt collectors goes viral. Writer/director Larry Yang's action drama, starring Jackie Chan, Liu Haocun and Kevin Guo. In Mandarin, with subtitles.

programme.title: Collateral
programme.desc: Action crime thriller from the director of Heat, starring Tom Cruise and Jamie Foxx. Suave hitman Vincent hijacks taxi driver Max and forces him to stop at a variety of locations in Los Angeles where he carries out his gruesome business. Realising that his unwilling participation will end with his demise, Max looks for means of escape.

programme.title: John Wick
programme.desc: Action thriller starring Keanu Reeves. An ex-hitman embarks on a bloody trail of revenge when some hoodlums kill his dog.

programme.title: John Wick: Chapter 2
programme.desc: Action thriller starring Keanu Reeves. Super-assassin John Wick is brought out of retirement once again when an old debt is called in by an Italian crime lord. Dispatched to Europe to carry out an assassination, Wick is himself targeted, resulting in a violent game of cat and mouse.

programme.title: Mamma Mia!
programme.desc: Musical romantic comedy featuring the music of Abba, and starring Meryl Streep, Colin Firth and Pierce Brosnan. On an idyllic Greek island, young Sophie Sheridan prepares to marry the man of her dreams. But a problem looks set to blight the big day as the bride doesn't know who her father is. So Sophie sends out invitations to three men who might fit the bill, hoping to solve the riddle once her g

programme.title: Mamma Mia! Here We Go Again
programme.desc: Musical romantic comedy sequel starring Lily James, Amanda Seyfried and Jeremy Irvine and featuring the songs of Abba. A now happily married Sophie prepares to reopen her late mother Donna's hotel. Meanwhile flashbacks show a young Donna discovering Greece and falling in love - several times.

programme.title: Chicago
programme.desc: Oscar-winning musical starring Catherine Zeta-Jones, RenÃ©e Zellweger and Richard Gere. In 1920s Chicago, chorus girl Roxie Hart shoots her lover and winds up in jail, believing her dreams of stardom are over. Enter hotshot lawyer Billy Flynn, whose clients include double murderess Velma Kelly, and Roxie begins to realise that there's no such thing as bad publicity.

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 3
programme.desc: Following the death of her father Gus, Toula Portokalos honours his dying wish to take the entire family to his childhood village and reconnect with their Greek roots. Toula's husband Ian joins the madcap expedition along with extended family including her brother Nick and Aunt Voula. Romantic comedy, starring Nia Vardalos and John Corbett.

programme.desc: While visiting an island for her husband's work, a woman meets a stranger who takes over her life. Thriller, starring Ashley Greene, Brooke Lyons and Tom Felton. Directed by Joel David Moore, better known as one of the stars of the Avatar films.

programme.title: Absolution
programme.desc: Crime drama starring Liam Neeson. An ageing career criminal and former boxer discovers he has developed a neurodegenerative disease that gives him only months to live. As a child, Furiosa is kidnapped from the "Green Place" by wasteland marauders ruled by the despotic Dementus, who murders her mother. Growing up to find herself caught in the crossfire between two rival warlords, Furiosa devises a plan to escape and to take revenge on Dementus.

programme.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
programme.desc: Futuristic action adventure starring Tom Hardy and Charlize Theron. In a world where water is precious and humanity faces extinction, a one-armed woman takes off across the desert with a lorry-load of females who've been imprisoned to bear children. Riding shotgun is Max, the infamous "Road Warrior".
